attributes.action: BREXIT Deal then Repeal: Parliament vote on the Deal before repeal EU Accession
attributes.additional_details:
The EC Act of 1972 info
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Communities_Act_1972_(UK)

Parliamentary Sovereignty
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parliamentary_sovereignty
attributes.background: The European Communities Act 1972 of the Parliament of UK legislated for the accession to the EU, and incorporation of European Union law into UK law. Petition insists Parliament votes on the LEAVE deal, before repealing the Act of Accession, so there is continuity and legal certainty at all times
